alert.note: Alert for Morongo Basin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 22 at 4:57AM PDT until March 23 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following area, Morongo Basin. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of washes, low-water crossings and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Periods of moderate to heavy rain with total amounts of 0.5 to 1.0 inches of rain will be possible around the Morongo Basin from this evening through Wednesday afternoon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
